problem_text_cn: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l1,l2与这三条平行线分别交于点A,B,C和点D,E,F,\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},DE=4,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight line l1, l2 and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and D, E, F, \frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{N_1}{N_2},DE=N_3, then the length of EF is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理的应用,能根据定理得出比例式是解此题的关键,注意:一组平行线截两条直线,所截得的对应线段成比例．
